name: Vanth's Demise
description:
Vanth's Demise
In a fantasy world, Vanth must battle merciless enemies to regain what was once his - his mortality. The Underlord holds this tightly within his grasp, and Vanth must battle demon's, 10 different demi-gods, 2 gods and all 7 eternals to reach him, all representing the dualities in life with their own unique story elements to be told.

The Devil May Cry inspired combat system is built for Virtual Reality, and provides an engaging and intense experience. Think Dark Souls meets Devil May Cry in VR.
Join Vanth on his conquest as he battles through different realms, defeating anyone who stands in his way.

It's hard to find a good Virtual Reality game that isn't just a shooting gallery.
 Most VR games are shallow and unimaginative, consisting of nothing more than you walking around in a small area and shooting things.
Vanth's Demise is different. This isn't just a VR game, it's an adventure that takes place in a fantasy world where you must battle merciless enemies to gain back what was once yours. 
Our VR game takes full advantage of the immersive capabilities of Virtual Reality, putting you in the middle of an epic adventure where you must battle your way through hordes of enemies to regain your mortality.

(This is just a start of what could be, visual assets and design direction can and will evolve)
